title: Deployments spanning smart home, automation, and robotics
subtitle: Every build is modular, OTA-ready, and maintained through DARI CONNECTER cloud.

projects.title: Penthouse Lighting Mesh
projects.shortDescription: Ambient lighting scenes, voice control, and presence-driven automation
projects.longDescription: We mapped 38 lighting circuits, integrated KNX dimmers with ESP32 gateways, and synced the entire home with voice scenes on Google Home & Alexa.

projects.title: Agro Greenhouse
projects.shortDescription: IoT irrigation, ventilation, and climate analytics
projects.longDescription: Arduino Mega boards supervise irrigation valves, fans, and UV grow lights while DARI CONNECTER supplies dashboards and alerts via Android.

projects.title: Industrial Energy Twin
projects.shortDescription: Energy meters, harmonic analysis, and demand response
projects.longDescription: ESP32 gateways stream Modbus telemetry to our cloud, delivering predictive load shedding and SMS alerts for a 2MW facility.

projects.title: Coastal Villa Retrofits
projects.shortDescription: Retrofit power outlets and HVAC control
projects.longDescription: ESP8266 relays upgraded legacy switches, enabling geo-fenced cooling, plug load management, and OTA updates with zero downtime.

projects.title: Factory Automation
projects.longDescription: Custom automation linking PLCs, conveyors, and robotic cells, complete with downtime analytics inside the DARI CONNECTER web app.

projects.title: Robotics Innovation Lab
projects.longDescription: We integrated collaborative robots, AGVs, and computer vision nodes, all orchestrated via secure tunnels and tablet-friendly dashboards.
